body.p:
Louisville Ky Nov 14th 60
To His Excellency Gov Magoffin

Enclosed I send you a petition of W M Duncan praying for relief against a judgment rendered against him in the City Court of Louisville together with recommendation therewith connected & also a letter of Judge Muir of the city -- I hope that you will favorably consider his petition and the recommendations and advise me as to your judgment on the premises

With great respect
Isaac, D, Stone
